titleStmt.title: A discourse consisting of motives for the enlargement and freedome of trade· Especially that of cloth, and other vvoollen manufactures, engrossed at present contrary to [brace] the law of nature, the law of nations, and the lawes of this kingdome. / By a company of private men who stile themselves merchant-adventurers. The first part. Aprill. 11. 1645 Imprimatur, Na. Brent.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Thomas, marchant.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Bishop for Stephen Bowtell, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible in Popes-Head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Johnson by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Bible in Popes-Head Alley.
